translations: n.（韩、朝、美、加、澳）柳，刘，俞，庾（人名）；（yoo）你（you 的视觉方言）

phrs.translation: 奥沙瓦, 乱世浮生, 德国幕尼黑, 韩国最具实力的作曲家
艾伦·余, 余亚伦, 唐纳德, 亚伦·余
孔刘, 孔侑, 主演孔侑, 姓名孔刘
魔女幼熙, 魔女游戏, 魔女宥熙

sentences.sentence: Yoo-Hoo! This is our Birthday Star! You guys see the big knife?
sentences.translation: 当当当当！！！！这就是生日之星，海先生。大家看到那把大刀了吗？

sentences.sentence: Research papers by Jae-in Yoo and Hyun-kyung Kim made important contributions to this article.
sentences.translation: Jae - in Yoo和Hyun - kyung Kim的研究论文对本文有重要贡献。

sentences.sentence: Between your middle ear and your throat there is a passage called the eustachian (say: yoo - stay -she-un) tube.
sentences.translation: 耳朵感染是怎样引起的？中耳和咽喉之间的通道叫耳咽管。
